job_purpose: Lead the development of new technology mining equipment by designing, prototyping, and testing electro-mechanical systems, developing embedded control systems, integrating sensor-driven automation, and contributing to the integration of AI technologies.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Design, prototype, and test electro-mechanical systems
Develop embedded control systems and integrate sensor-driven automation
Contribute to the integration of AI technologies to enhance automation, decision-making, and system performance
Work closely with mechanical and electrical teams, fabricators, and external partners, locally and internationally
Support field testing and real-world application of engineered solutions
Contribute to R&D documentation and technical reporting
Assist in identifying, documenting, and managing intellectual property and patent applications related to product innovations
required_qualifications: Degree in Mechatronics, Electrical, and/or Mechanical Engineering
3+ years of experience in industrial automation, product development, or related fields
Strong practical experience with embedded systems and control logic
Confidence with CAD, prototyping, and on-site troubleshooting
Demonstrated ability to think outside the box to design complex and innovative engineering solutions
company_details: Innovative Mining Services (IMS) is a fast-growing, Australian-owned company that specializes in turning practical ideas into real-world innovation for the mining industry. IMS is known for its patented, award-winning products that have been recognized by Tier 1 miners for their impact on safety and performance. Join a company that leads global innovation in mining technology, with products already in use internationally and a strong pipeline of future opportunities. IMS offers a supportive, close-knit environment where engineering excellence is valued and recognized, modern facilities in Malaga, flexible working arrangements, and opportunities for career growth as the company expands locally and globally.
